软件包 chessFrame 的分层结构

软件包分层结构：
所有软件包

类分层结构

  • java.lang.Object
    • chessFrame.Chess
    • chessFrame.ChessClient
    • chessFrame.ChessClient.Client (implements java.lang.Runnable)
    • java.awt.Component (implements java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable)
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent (implements java.io.Serializable)
          • javax.swing.JPanel (implements javax.accessibility.Accessible)
            • chessFrame.ChessBoard (implements java.awt.event.MouseListener)
            • chessFrame.GameChatClient (implements java.awt.event.ActionListener)
            • chessFrame.NamePanel
            • chessFrame.ReadyPanel (implements java.awt.event.ActionListener)
        • java.awt.Window (implements javax.accessibility.Accessible)
          • java.awt.Frame (implements java.awt.MenuContainer)
            • javax.swing.JFrame (implements javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants)
              • chessFrame.Game
    • chessFrame.GameChatClient.Client (implements java.lang.Runnable)
    • chessFrame.GameOption (implements java.lang.Runnable)
    • chessFrame.PlayerPanel
    • chessFrame.ScoreUpdate
    • chessFrame.Voice
